name: Jaffar
overview: Jaffar is an action arcade game. Year 1248, Baghdad. Grand Vizier Mohamed al-Rimon kidnapped the princess Miranda and imprisoned her in his castle. In exchange for the release of the Princess Kalih al-Mamun promised hand of the princess and the title of Duke. Jaffar has about an hour to complete the task. The palace consists of nine levels. During the mission Jaffar randomly encounters rats and birds. Contact with them means the loss of energy. Jaffar can trample rats, birds can be only steered clear. The tasks focus on finding objects and using them in the right places in order to reach the harem on the second floor of the palace.
